channel.title: Flowcharts on dev-review
channel.description: Recent content in Flowcharts on dev-review

item.description: Code Review Workflow Here’s a high-level view of a workflow researchers can follow to make code review part of their development process. Find a reviewer There is no code review without a reviewer or reviewers. The good news is, almost any researcher who codes is a good candidate for being one. Potential reviewers are not far: in your own research group, others you collaborate with or your local Research Software Engineering group.
